channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The $\Delta_1$-property of $X$ is equivalent to the Choquet property of $B_1(X)$
item.description: arXiv:2503.10491v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We give a characterization of the $\Delta_1$-property of any Tychonoff space $X$ in terms of the function space $B_1(X)$ of all Baire-one real-valued functions on a space $X$ with the topology of pointwise convergence. We establish that for a Tychonoff space $X$ the $\Delta_1$-property is equivalent to the Choquet property of $B_1(X)$. Also we construct under $ZFC$ an example of a separable pseudocompact space $X$ such that $C_p(X)$ is $\kappa$-Frechet-Urysohn but $X$ fails to be a $\Delta_1$-space. This answers a question of Kakol-Leiderman-Tkachuk.
item.dc:creator: Alexander V. Osipov
